Conversion Rate Optimization

Are you properly maintaining your website?

Regular testing and research

I suggest low-effort high-impact changes to improve your website

Methods: Hotjar for heatmaps and Google Optimize for AB testing. Our tests have informed design, CX, and, dev decisions.

Benefits:

  • Regular changes prevent tedious redesigns
  • Don't leave money on the table
  • >
    • Company-wide CRO principles
    • Glossary: the name and use of every website piece
    • adding a high-converting mini-form to all pages
    • introducing grids to development
    • upgrading a design demo tool
    • and building live prototypes of form updates (float labels and expandable fields).

Thanks for being here.
